CONSULTANCY & CONCEPT

We will drive your product forward

Present your product, start up, or portfolio in a beautifully modern way. Turn your visitors in to clients.

  • BRANDING & IDENTITY

    We will design the complete look & feel, solve communication issues, and even define the name, if you want.

  • USER CENTRIC DESIGN

    Design UX first, allowing for ease of use and user centric behaviours.

  • USER INTERFACE DESIGN

    Focus the relevant information, set the right call to action on the best possible position and prepare the content in the right way. That leads to beautiful, easy to use and clear interfaces.

Game concepting & Production

Whether custom, branded or licenced, we can help develop the framework through the Game Design Document.Covering everything from game art creation to level design, gameplay review and optimisation to soundtrack creation.

Once the easy part is finished, we’ll help you take the game to market with the necessary launch kits, teasers and PR programme.

We make awesome games and content with Unity.

Download the app from the Apple Store, We hope you will like it, Have fun!

" WHY CHOOSE WHOOSH+ ? "

Due to having several of our own projects and attending some startups from the beginning we´re very familiar with concepting projects in their entirety. That means we don´t only understand your requirements, we develop will your idea further to an easy to use product which inspires your customers and performs for your marketers.
